body:
1. Is it true that the staff applications are coming this august?
2.Is it true that the format of the staff applications will change?

If so, whyyyyyy

I figured out today that the format will be changed :c

for the 2 most important questions I remade it yesterday in an essay, for both of the questions :c

title: Staff Application Rumors? (staff?)

replies.body: I don't think that the staff team is permitted to disclose this information as of yet.
